mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT JobId AS username,Psd AS pwd,'ROLE_FSUSER' AS fsRole FROM dbo.FsUser WHERE UserTypeIdBySysD=1 AND UserStatus=1 UNION SELECT JobId AS username,Psd AS pwd,'ROLE_WBUSER' AS fsRole FROM dbo.FsUser WHERE UserTypeIdBySysD=2 AND UserStatus=1 UNION SELECT Account AS username,Psd AS pwd,'ROLE_FSQS' AS fsRole FROM dbo.DeliveryMan ) AS fs WHERE fs.username=#{username}
